template.name: apidocx
template.value: /** * @api {POST} $END$ * @apiGroup 分组名称 * @apiName 接口名称 * @apiVersion 1.0.0 * * @apiDescription 接口描述 * * @apiHeader (group) {String} access-key=keyValue Users unique access-key. * * @apiHeaderExample {json} Header-Example: * { * "access-key": "keyValue" * } * * @apiParam (group) {String} $param1 参数说明1 * @apiParam (group) {String} $param2 参数说明2 * @apiParam {Object} address address object. * @apiParam {String} [address[street]] Optional street and number. * @apiParam {String} [address[zip]] Optional zip code. * @apiParam {String} address.city city. * * @apiParamExample {json} Request-Example: * { * "id": 4711 * } * * @apiSuccess (group) {Number} code 状态码，0：请求成功 * @apiSuccess (group) {String} message 提示信息 * @apiSuccess {Object} data data object. * @apiSuccess {Number} data.age age. * @apiSuccess {String} data.image image. * * @apiSuccessExample {json} Success-Response: * { * "code":0, * "data":[ * age: 30, * image: "http://***" * ] * } * * @apiError (group) {string} code 错误码 * * @apiErrorExample {json} Error-Response: * { * "code": 5001, * "message": "接口异常" * } * */
